titles.title: Thank You for the Cross (Worthy is the Lamb)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v1 v2 c1 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Thank You for the cross Lord
Thank You for the price You paid
Bearing all my sin and shame
In love You came
And gave amazing grace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank you for this love Lord
Thank you for your nail pierced hands
You washed me in Your cleansing flow
Now all I know is Your forgiveness and embrace

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb
Seated on the throne
We crown You now with many crowns
You reign victorious

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
High and lifted up
Jesus Son of God
The treasure of heaven crucified
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb
